hotel.name: Hotel Alfa International
hotel.des: {"amenities":"Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access and concierge services.","spoken_languages":"Hindi, Arabic, English","rooms":"Make yourself at home in one of the 26 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and fans, and housekeeping is provided daily.","onsite_payments":"Visa, Diners Club, Debit cards, Cash, Mastercard","dining":"Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM.","business_amenities":"Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.","location":"With a stay at Hotel Alfa International, you'll be centrally located in Mumbai, within a 10-minute drive of U.S. Consulate General and NESCO Center.  This beach hotel is 12.9 mi (20.8 km) from Gateway of India and 2.5 mi (4 km) from Juhu Beach.","attractions":"Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.  Linking Road - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi  Nanavati Super Speciality Hospital - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi  NMIMS Mumbai - 1.7 km / 1 mi  Juhu Beach - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi  Carter Road Promenade - 3.2 km / 2 mi  ISKCON Temple - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi  Hill Road - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi  Andheri Sports Complex - 4.9 km / 3 mi  Lilavati Hospital - 5 km / 3.1 mi  Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital & Medical Research Institute - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi  Bandra Family Court - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi  Bandstand Promenade - 6 km / 3.7 mi  MIDC Industrial Estate - 6 km / 3.7 mi  MMRDA Grounds - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi  Versova Beach - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi  The nearest major airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport (BOM) - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi","headline":"In Mumbai (Vile Parle West)"}
